p: GraphPad Prism 5.0 (San Diego, CA, USA) was used for statistical analyses. Data are presented as the means ± SD. Two-way ANOVA and one-way ANOVA were used to compare significant differences. For statistical comparison of the means between two groups, unpaired two-tailed Student’s t-test was carried out. A P value of less than 0.05 was considered statistically significant.
